DOC.brief_summary: In this clinical trial, accuracy evaluation of Bayer Contour XT blood glucose monitoring system and blood glucose monitoring systems from other companies across the overall tested glucose range will be performed.
DOC.brief_title: Analytical Performance Evaluation of Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems- Investigator Sponsored ContourÂ® XT Comparator Study - Ulm Germany
